Name: Great Beyond
Details: A term commonly used in the Periphery, the Great Beyond can have several meanings, depending on the person you ask. For some it means the unexplored space around Terra and the Inner Sphere, where there are no borders or limits, usually associated with freedom and colonization. To others, it invokes images of death and the afterlife, a deep dark abyss filled with demons and monsters that will always keep mankind on its grasp.
